duties_responsibilities.duty: Improve the long-term capabilities of the area by evaluating and improving processes within work areas.
Refine learning tools and techniques across the Fulfillment Center to measure the effectiveness of learning.
Focus on identifying areas for associate cross training and support, and implement training to support the objective.
Assist with process improvement through PDCA and Kaizen activities.
Ensure accuracy of training records through electronic data capturing tools and FC Console reports.
Monitor standard work and best practices to ensure accuracy and compliance.
Support ADHOC requests as needed and identify and remove associate and operation barriers.
Gain a working understanding of all process paths.

education_certification.credential: 1+ years of Microsoft Office products and applications experience
